problem.markdown:
Mini Quiz (not graded) - PDF and CSV Import ====
>>PDF forms can be automatically generated by DHIS 2 in order to enter data offline<< (x) True ( ) False
[explanation] PDF forms can be generated within the data set maintenance application to allow users to enter their data completely offline. There are some drawbacks to this however as changes in the PDF will not be reflected online until the PDF is either re-imported or the changes are manually made online as well. [explanation]
>>DHIS 2 can natively import an Excel file in any format<< ( ) True (x) False
[explanation] DHIS 2 can natively import a CSV file. CSV files can be made in any number of applications (including Excel). The CSV format that DHIS 2 recognizes is specific, and the file that is imported must follow this format if using the built in tools that DHIS 2 provides for importing data. [explanation]
>>DHIS 2 has functionality to import large amounts of data at once so this data does not need to be re-entered again<< (x) True ( ) False
[explanation] DHIS 2 supports several different file formats when importing data. Using these formats, large amounts of data can be imported together. This can be a one-time occurrence when migrating from a legacy system or a routine occurrence where data is normally being brought into DHIS 2 from other sources. [explanation]
problem.h3: Mini Quiz (not graded) - PDF and CSV Import
problem.p: PDF forms can be automatically generated by DHIS 2 in order to enter data offline

choicegroup.label: PDF forms can be automatically generated by DHIS 2 in order to enter data offline

div.p: PDF forms can be generated within the data set maintenance application to allow users to enter their data completely offline. There are some drawbacks to this however as changes in the PDF will not be reflected online until the PDF is either re-imported or the changes are manually made online as well.

problem.p: DHIS 2 can natively import an Excel file in any format

choicegroup.label: DHIS 2 can natively import an Excel file in any format

div.p: DHIS 2 can natively import a CSV file. CSV files can be made in any number of applications (including Excel). The CSV format that DHIS 2 recognizes is specific, and the file that is imported must follow this format if using the built in tools that DHIS 2 provides for importing data.

problem.p: DHIS 2 has functionality to import large amounts of data at once so this data does not need to be re-entered again

choicegroup.label: DHIS 2 has functionality to import large amounts of data at once so this data does not need to be re-entered again

div.p: DHIS 2 supports several different file formats when importing data. Using these formats, large amounts of data can be imported together. This can be a one-time occurrence when migrating from a legacy system or a routine occurrence where data is normally being brought into DHIS 2 from other sources.
